h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Key Items Locations
content: Below, you can find a list of all the Key Items in Black Myth: Wukong, where they are located, and the use for each of them. Clicking on each one will take you to a breakdown of where to find them in more detail. You can also use our Walkthrough. Additionally, you can also check each one off as you obtain them.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Key_Items.md', within the main section titled 'Key Items', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Key Items Locations'.
The content is as follows:
Below, you can find a list of all the Key Items in Black Myth: Wukong, where they are located, and the use for each of them. Clicking on each one will take you to a breakdown of where to find them in more detail. You can also use our Walkthrough. Additionally, you can also check each one off as you obtain them.
